welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elze, Germany! Get ready to immerse yourself in the idyllic charm of this quaint town known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Elze has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
